paragraph: Jack Driessen (born 11 July 1980 in Roermond, Netherlands) is a Dutch keyboardist, songwriter and arranger. He is co-founder and former member of the Dutch symphonic death metal band MaYaN. Furthermore he is known as the first keyboardist of the symphonic metal band After Forever (1995â€“2000) and as songwriter on 3 albums of the symphonic metal band Epica.
Profile at the official MaYaN website
